name: RELIV LLC
description: Developer of healthcare management platform designed to integrate doctors, patients, insurance, and pharmacies. The company's platform offers appointment management, calendar management, automatic reminder, electronic billing, cloud clinical history, and inventory management, enabling users to gain access to a simple and seamless interaction.
